title: Person of Interest S2E6 - Doughnut Tastes Funny
author: Morgs K
comment:
"AHH! BEAR! What did we discuss about boundaries?" Bear whines
Haha I love Bear and Finch :D It's great to remember how, in the beginning, Finch didn't like Bear after Reese brought him home, but then gradually grew to like Bear as much as if not more than the others, and Bear became Finch's protector :)
I love how Finch doesn't tell him!

Haha Reese's expression at 0:26 

I don't normally ask this, but could you upload the ending of the latest episode the scenes mentioning Grace (old man and at the library)?
LMAO! Bear is so adorable. x3

My wife and I went to Sutter, California a few years ago. I stopped and got a cup of coffee and then later I found a donut shop. As I was getting ready to order some to go with my coffee the sales person happened to mention that these were doggie donuts. Needless to say I didn't buy any.
description:
Bear is caught licking one of the doughnuts - Finch doesn't remove it in time 

Funny little scene

***Please note: I do not own this footage - It remains the property of Warner Bros. It is simply a fan video ***
